name: @nodedb/core
description: A cross-platform tool for managing all databases

scripts.ci: npm run -s clean:all && npm run -s test && npm run -s compile
scripts.compile: npm run -s clean && npm run -s copy && cp -Rf ./node_modules ./tmp && npm run -s compile:icns && (cd ./tmp && npm prune --production)
scripts.dist: npm run -s package && npm run -s dist:rename && mkdir -p dist && npm run -s dist:compress
scripts.dist:compress: npm run -s dist:compress:armv7l && npm run -s dist:compress:linux32 && npm run -s dist:compress:linux64 && npm run -s dist:compress:osx && npm run -s dist:compress:win32 && npm run -s dist:compress:win64;
scripts.dist:rename: mv build/nodedb-darwin-x64 build/osx && mv build/nodedb-linux-armv7l build/armv7l && mv build/nodedb-linux-ia32 build/linux32 && mv build/nodedb-linux-x64 build/linux64 && mv build/nodedb-win32-ia32 build/win32 && mv build/nodedb-win32-x64 build/win64
scripts.package: npm run -s clean && mkdir -p ./tmp && electron-packager-compile ./tmp nodedb --icon ./tmp/src/assets/img/logo.icns --all --out ./build --overwrite true
scripts.serve: npm run -s serve:drivers && concurrently "npm run -s serve:api" "npm run -s serve:app"
scripts.serve:app: DEBUG=-electron-compile:* API_URL=http://localhost:3000 ENABLE_LIVE_RELOAD=true SHOW_DEV_TOOLS=true electron . | bunyan
scripts.serve:dist: npm run serve:drivers && npm run compile && electron-packager-compile ./tmp dist --icon ./tmp/src/assets/img/logo.icns --out ./build --overwrite true && $(node scripts/serve-dist)
scripts.test: npm run -s test:lint && npm run -s test:unit
scripts.test:lint: npm run -s test:lint:src && npm run -s test:lint:test

author: Simon Emms <simon@simonemms.com>
